snippet.title: Precept Main Demo
snippet.description:
About the Game

"Your mundane routine is over. Can you survive the nightmare?"  What started as an ordinary night shift for a security guard turns into a horrifying ordeal. The once-familiar halls of the company are now twisted into a nightmarish labyrinth, filled with deadly threats and the eerie presence of unknown entities hunting you at every turn.

Key Features

Solve to Survive  Each floor presents unique puzzles and challenges that stand between you and survival. The routine job you once knew is a distant memory.

Deadly Environments and Entities  Face a dynamic, ever-threatening environment and mysterious foes. They’ll stop at nothing to end your journey. Your choices will decide your fate.

Immersive Horror Experience  Uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows and attempt your escape under extreme pressure. The chilling atmosphere, enhanced by immersive sound design and visuals, will keep you on edge.

This Game Asks You:

"Do you have the courage to face the truth in the endless darkness?"  Survive. If you can.
